pages.text:
Host An Event
Tournaments & Outings
Weddings
Meetings & Corporate
Event Rooms
Host Your Memorable Occasions in St. Augustine
Marsh Creek offers the perfect setting for your special event. Whether you’re planning a family birthday party, formal dinner or elegant wedding reception, we hope you will choose our Club as the venue for the occasion. We will help custom design your menu to fit within your budget and also offer full assistance for your event needs including design, theme, menus and more. Our Executive Chef will spin his magic to create a memorable meal and our club staff will attend to your every need.
Schedule A Tour
WE CAN HELP YOU PLAN:
Breakfast/Lunch Meetings
Rehearsal Dinners
Seminars
Wedding/Baby Showers
Birthday Parties
Holiday Parties
Pool Parties
Retirement Parties
School Award Dinners
Anniversary Parties
Family Reunions
Wedding Receptions
Intimate Gatherings

Mary Claire  Gaze information modal
Mary Claire  Gaze
General Manager
Serving since 2016
Mary Claire .Gaze
Mary Claire .Gaze
Contact Me
About Mary Claire
Mary Claire Gaze is coming to Marsh Creek Country Club from Firethorne Country Club and brings with her 27 years of experience in the private club industry. Born and raised in Pittsburgh PA she was graduated from Miami University, Oxford Ohio and began her service industry career in Spring Lake NJ, and continued in Hilton Head, SC and most recently Raleigh NC.She strives to exceed expectations and is always seeking new and fun ideas to improve communication and consistency. She is married and lives with her husband Dave and their two children, Matthew and Rebecca. Mary Claire enjoys meeting and serving all Members and their families, creating exceptional Member experiences!
Contact Me
Join the Marsh Creek Community
Membership
Learn the benefits of membership at Marsh Creek and start experiencing the very best of St. Augustine and beyond.
Learn More

Marsh Creek Country Club
Opens in new window
169 Marshside Dr
St Augustine, FL 
                                32080
1 904-461-1101

Skip Image Carousel
Membership at Marsh Creek Country Club
Marsh Creek Country Club is the only private club on Anastasia Island and offers a dynamic and diverse experience for Members. Our Club provides a recreational retreat, family-friendly atmosphere and the very best of the St. Augustine area and beyond.
Schedule A Tour
Opens in new tab
View Our Membership Brochure
XLife Benefits
Your new home away from home awaits in the St. Augustine community.
Our recent renovation includes new golf greens, the new La Mesa dining room and bar areas and new lobby areas. You'll enjoy access to our beautiful championship golf courses including one of the best in northeast Florida, a variety of golf leagues and events, a state-of-the-art fitness center with group instruction and personal trainers on staff, and a vibrant tennis and pickleball program with three professionals and leagues for all levels of play. A robust social calendar keeps all of these amenities brimming with incredible experiences perfect for all ages to build lasting relationships.
Wherever you go, your membership goes, too.
While our Club is exclusively open to Members and their guests, our Members have special access and opportunities at many other top-tier country clubs and golf courses in the St. Augustine area and nationwide through our relationship to the Invited network. Wherever you go, your membership goes with you.
Become A Member
Membership Categories
Choose a membership category to fit your lifestyle.
Contact Our Membership Director To Find Out More
Full Golf
Full access for Member, spouse and dependent children 24 and younger to golf Tuesday - Sunday, plus all tennis, fitness, swimming, and dining and social facilities at the Club. Members can make tee times up to 2 weeks in advance. Monthly dues include complimentary green fees, complimentary range balls and access to short game practice area.
YEX
For Members aged 40 years old or younger. Full access for Member, spouse and dependent children 24 and younger to golf Tuesday - Sunday, plus all tennis, fitness, swimming, and dining and social facilities at the Club. Members can make tee times up to 2 weeks in advance. Monthly dues include complimentary green fees, complimentary range balls and access to short game practice area.
Sports Access
Access for Member, spouse and dependent children 24 and younger to all non-golf areas including tennis, fitness, swimming, and dining and social facilities at the Club. Golf course and driving range access are available for a fee.
Social
Access for Member, spouse and dependent children 24 and younger to all fitness, swimming, and dining and social facilities at the Club. Golf course access is available for a fee 6 times annually per membership and the driving range is only available when playing a round of golf.
Non-Resident
Must live outside the 5-county area for 9 months per year. Access for Member, spouse and dependent children 24 and younger to all non-golf areas including tennis, fitness, swimming, and dining and social facilities at the Club. Golf course and driving range access are available for a fee.
Hold on, there's more...
• Love teeing off during your travels?
• Enjoy discounts when you dine?
Get all of this and more with XLife.
Click to Discover XLife
Did You Know? The Invited network extends across the Jacksonville area and Members with XLife enhanced benefits have access based on their membership category.
Xlife Benefits

Mary Claire .Gaze

Contact Me
About Mary Claire
Mary Claire Gaze is coming to Marsh Creek Country Club from Firethorne Country Club and brings with her 27 years of experience in the private club industry. Born and raised in Pittsburgh PA she was graduated from Miami University, Oxford Ohio and began her service industry career in Spring Lake NJ, and continued in Hilton Head, SC and most recently Raleigh NC.She strives to exceed expectations and is always seeking new and fun ideas to improve communication and consistency. She is married and lives with her husband Dave and their two children, Matthew and Rebecca. Mary Claire enjoys meeting and serving all Members and their families, creating exceptional Member experiences!
Contact Me
Marianne Cettei
Membership Director
Contact Me
904-656-7090
Contact Me
About Marianne
+
Close
Marianne Cettei information modal
Marianne Cettei
Membership Director
Serving since 1993
904-656-7090
Marianne.Cettei
904-656-7090
Marianne.Cettei
Contact Me
About Marianne
Marianne began her career at Marsh Creek in April 1993 as secretary to the Golf Course Superintendent and then moved to the accounting department where she eventually became Assistant Controller. In 1996 Marianne became the Membership Director and has enjoyed her job immensely. Her position allows her to meet new members and get them acclimated to the club and she also enjoys being involved in all events and day to day activities.Marianne is married to Ed and has a daughter Britta. Marianne was born in St. Augustine and loves calling this area home – and so will you.

Skip Image Carousel
Tournaments & Outings
Weddings
Events
Meetings & Corporate
Event Rooms
Experience the Beauty of Marsh Creek
Whether you're a Member or not, you're welcome to host your next event with us!
Located on Anastasia Island among the salt marshes of the Intracoastal Waterway, Marsh Creek Country Club is the perfect venue to host any occasion. Our clubhouse has stunning views with spectacular sunsets and is just minutes from historic downtown St. Augustine and nearby beaches.
Contact our Event Sales Director
Tournaments & Outings
We understand that course selection and an overall great package are key to hosting a memorable event. Let Marsh Creek assist you in planning your next tournament or golf outing.
Start Planning Your Outing
Explore Tournaments & Outings
Celebrate Your Dream Wedding at Marsh Creek
Congratulations on your engagement! We would be honored to be included in making your wedding dreams come true. Whether you are local or planning a destination wedding, our dedicated and experienced private events team will assist you every step of the way to ensure your wedding is everything you can imagine and more.
Schedule A Tour
Explore Weddings
“Not only are the grounds and club very picturesque and calming, but the staff is attentive and professional and the food is excellent.”
- Gabby
Your Event, Your Way
At Marsh Creek Country Club, we are devoted to creating unique and memorable experiences for every occasion. Whether you are planning a modest family gathering or a grand celebration, our private events team will offer personalized assistance, customizing your menu, theme and design to fit within your budget. We will attend to every detail so you and your guests can enjoy a spectacular event.
Explore Events
Start Planning Your Event
Combine Business with Pleasure in St. Augustine
Host your next corporate event at Marsh Creek, and discover new ways to motivate your team and impress your business associates. We provide customized menus, personalized service and professional accommodations for a variety of business functions, including employee play days, team building sessions, formal strategy meetings, corporate dinners and client golf outings.
Schedule A Meeting
Explore Meetings & Corporate
“Marsh Creek Country Club is WONDERFUL! The overall price of everything was more than reasonable, considering the exquisite food, venue and service you get.”
- Candice
Mary Claire  Gaze
General Manager
Contact Me
Contact Me
About Mary Claire
+
Close
Mary Claire  Gaze information modal
Mary Claire  Gaze
General Manager
Serving since 2016
Mary Claire .Gaze
Mary Claire .Gaze
Contact Me
About Mary Claire
Mary Claire Gaze is coming to Marsh Creek Country Club from Firethorne Country Club and brings with her 27 years of experience in the private club industry. Born and raised in Pittsburgh PA she was graduated from Miami University, Oxford Ohio and began her service industry career in Spring Lake NJ, and continued in Hilton Head, SC and most recently Raleigh NC.She strives to exceed expectations and is always seeking new and fun ideas to improve communication and consistency. She is married and lives with her husband Dave and their two children, Matthew and Rebecca. Mary Claire enjoys meeting and serving all Members and their families, creating exceptional Member experiences!
Contact Me

Mary Claire  Gaze
General Manager
Serving since 2016
Mary Claire .Gaze
Mary Claire .Gaze
Contact Me
About Mary Claire
Mary Claire Gaze is coming to Marsh Creek Country Club from Firethorne Country Club and brings with her 27 years of experience in the private club industry. Born and raised in Pittsburgh PA she was graduated from Miami University, Oxford Ohio and began her service industry career in Spring Lake NJ, and continued in Hilton Head, SC and most recently Raleigh NC.She strives to exceed expectations and is always seeking new and fun ideas to improve communication and consistency. She is married and lives with her husband Dave and their two children, Matthew and Rebecca. Mary Claire enjoys meeting and serving all Members and their families, creating exceptional Member experiences!

Marianne Cettei
Membership Director
Serving since 1993
904-656-7090
Marianne.Cettei
904-656-7090
Marianne.Cettei
Contact Me
About Marianne
Marianne began her career at Marsh Creek in April 1993 as secretary to the Golf Course Superintendent and then moved to the accounting department where she eventually became Assistant Controller. In 1996 Marianne became the Membership Director and has enjoyed her job immensely. Her position allows her to meet new members and get them acclimated to the club and she also enjoys being involved in all events and day to day activities.Marianne is married to Ed and has a daughter Britta. Marianne was born in St. Augustine and loves calling this area home – and so will you.
